summary.para: Retrieves the fence for the protected session. From the fence, you can retrieve the current uniqueness validity value (using ), and add monitors for changes to its value. This is a read-only fence.

param.name: riid
param.para: The GUID of the interface to a fence. Most commonly, , although it may be any GUID for any interface. If the protected session object doesn’t support the interface for this GUID, the function returns E_NOINTERFACE.

param.name: ppFence
param.para: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the fence for the given protected session.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
